issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description:
1. Launch KS.
2. Go to BaseUI -> Views ->scroll views -->scroll views textarea.

h5.Actual Result:
1. We just see a white window with nothing on it.

h5.Expected Result:
1. We should see three text areas on the screen.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink: BaseUI > Views > scroll views > scroll views textarea; we just get an empty white window.
fields.environment:
Environment:
Appc Studio : 3.2.3.201403250634
Ti SDK : 3.2.2.GA
Mac OSX : 10.8.5
Alloy : 1.3.1	
CLI - 3.2.3-dev
BB Z10 - 10.2.1.2.2156
Kitchensink from studio (3.2.2)

comments.body: Do not use "auto" for size, use either Ti.UI.SIZE or Ti.UI.FILL.

Tested and verified 3 text areas in the view. 
Mac osx 10.9.4 Mavericks
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201407111535
Titanium SDK, build:  3.3.0.GA
Node.JS Version: v0.10.28
